title: Wildkin Kids Educational Play Rug for Boys and Girls, Features Skid-Proof Backing and Serged Borders, Play Rugs Measures 80 x 39 Inches with Durable Nylon Material, Olive Kids (Cityscape)
features: PLAYTIME APPROVED – Wildkin’s Play Rug is the perfect addition to playrooms, bedrooms, classrooms, and more. Measuring 80 x 39 inches, its durable design and vibrant colors make it a playtime essential that your child will love!

EYE-CATCHING DESIGN – Each Play Rug features bold designs that encourage young imaginations. Whether your child dreams of traveling back in time to adventure with dinosaurs or exploring exotic lands on a fascinating safari, this rug will set the stage and help them take playtime to the next level. Our educational Play Rugs are ideal for young learners looking to master their ABCs or perfect their knowledge of U.S. state capitals.

CREATED WITH SAFETY IN MIND – Playtime can definitely get a bit crazy at times. That’s why we’ve created our Play Rugs with a skid-proof backing to ensure that your little one can play safely. Its non-slip design means you can feel confident placing your rug on a variety of surfaces, including hardwood, laminate, carpet, and more.

BUILT TO LAST– Each Play Rug was designed with durability in mind. Made from ultra-strong nylon material and featuring serged borders, this rug can withstand even the most rambunctious play sessions without unraveling or fraying. If playtime gets a little too messy just shake to remove loose dirt and wash and rinse in cold water.

COORDINATES WITH OTHER WILDKIN ROOM DÉCOR – Make a theme out of it! Each Play Rug was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin décor. From hampers, to bedding, to storage cubes, your little one will love seeing their favorite designs pop up throughout their play space.
description: Wildkin’s Play Rug is the perfect addition to playrooms, bedrooms, classrooms, and more. Measuring 80 x 39 inches, its durable design and vibrant colors make it a playtime essential that your child will love! Each Play Rug features bold designs that encourage young imaginations. From hampers, to bedding, to storage cubes, your little one will love seeing their favorite designs pop up throughout their play space. Shake to remove loose dirt, wash and rinse in cold water. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low is recommended. 90-day manufacturer's warranty against defects - normal wear-and-tear, and misuse excluded. Rigorously tested to ensure that all parts are lead-safe, bpa-free, phthalate-free, and conform to all rules and regulations set forth by the Consumer Products Safety Commission.
